2) package Assign;

public class Loops {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i=1;
		while(i<20)
		{
			System.out.println(i+" ");
			i=i+2;
		}

	}

}

3) package Assign;

public class Nestedfor {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TO print given pattern
		int k=4;
		for(int i=1;i<=4;i++)
		{
			for(int j=1;j<=i;j++)
			{
		System.out.print("*");
		}
	
		System.out.println();
		
	}
	
	}
	}
